holidays.title: Apple Tree Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Apple Tree Day and learn about the history of apple cultivation in the U.S.

holidays.title: Armenian Christmas
holidays.description: Share the festive cheer this Armenian Christmas with lights, love, and merriment.

holidays.title: Day of Los Reyes
holidays.description: Dia de Los Reyes is a Christ-centered celebration of family, love, and sacrificial giving.

holidays.title: Dry Bean Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate our love for beans. Don’t worry, jelly beans also count.

holidays.title: Epiphany
holidays.description: Thought Christmas is over? Epiphany marks the final celebratory day of the Christian holiday season!

holidays.title: National Bean Day
holidays.description: National Bean Day is the perfect excuse to cook our favorite comfort food.

holidays.title: National Cuddle Day
holidays.description: It’s a great excuse to warm up by cuddling with those closest to you!

holidays.title: National Davis Day
holidays.description: Calling all Davis’! it’s your turn to get the spotlight as we celebrate your special day.

holidays.title: National Samantha Day
holidays.description: No matter the surname or the birthday, what kind of Samantha are you?

holidays.title: National Smith Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to all the Smiths and celebrated by all the Smith lovers.

holidays.title: National Take a Poet to Lunch Day
holidays.description: Get your wallets out and treat your friendly neighborhood poet to a free lunch!

holidays.title: National Take Down the Christmas Tree Day
holidays.description: Waiting for the perfect day to take down your Christmas tree? Well, now you have it.

holidays.title: National Walker’s Shortbread Day
holidays.description: Try the irresistible all butter taste of Walker's Shortbread Today!

holidays.title: Uruguay Children's Day/Ephiphany
holidays.description: Today we join with the children to celebrate this special day that revolves around receiving gifts.

holidays.title: World Day of War Orphans
holidays.description: War affects us all, including children who have to suffer the early pain of parental loss.

holidays.title: Arin Hanson’s Birthday
holidays.description: What an endless display of creative skills, abilities, and talent Arin Hanson is!

holidays.title: Eric Trump’s Birthday
holidays.description: For the son of a former president, his wealth and status are highly desirable.

holidays.title: Hilaria Thomas Baldwin’s Birthday
holidays.description: Trendsetter, yoga buff, actress, and great mother — a few reasons to love Hilaria Baldwin!

holidays.title: Irina Shayk’s Birthday
holidays.description: Beautiful, talented, and extremely compassionate, the talented Russian supermodel Irina Shayk is just so adorable!

holidays.title: Jay B’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are no limits to success for this multi-talented singer, songwriter, dancer, actor, and model.

holidays.title: Joan of Arc’s Birthday
holidays.description: The heroism, martyrdom, courage, and selflessness of Joan of Arc live on.

holidays.title: Keyshia Ka'oir’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented model and entrepreneur can do anything she sets her mind to.

holidays.title: MattyB’s Birthday
holidays.description: MattyB is an extraordinary young man who is making a huge impact in the entertainment industry.

holidays.title: Norman Reedus’s Birthday
holidays.description: Norman Reedus has various talents. This actor and singer is also a great T.V. host.

holidays.title: Ree Drummond’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ree Drummond is by far one of the best bloggers and authors of our time.

holidays.title: Rowan Atkinson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented comedian, actor, and writer has taught us the value of a good laugh.

holidays.title: Tiffany Pollard’s Birthday
holidays.description: This T.V. celebrity has been on numerous television series, gaining fame all around the world.
